text: Michael Barry Botha (born ) is a South African professional rugby union player who currently plays for the in the Pro14 and the in the Currie Cup and the Rugby Challenge. His regular position is fullback. ==References== Category:South African rugby union players Category:Living people Category:1997 births Category:People from Hibiscus Coast Local Municipality Category:Rugby union fullbacks Category:Eastern Province Elephants players Category:Southern Kings Pro14 players
title: Michael Botha
